content.text: The Cereans were a species of sentient humanoids. They were distinguished by their enlarged conical cranium that contained a binary brain. The Jedi Master Ki-Adi-Mundi, who sat the Jedi Council during the waning years of the Galactic Republic, was a Cerean male.
